title: 04/13/2021 - The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/13/2021 - The Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about Julian Edelman announcing his retirement and why he belongs in the Hall of Fame. He takes a look at the NFL draft to determine which of the quarterbacks expected to be drafted in the top 10 will have the most success. He also tells you which team is destined to fail in 2021 based on who they hired at head coach. Plus, Pro Bowl WR TJ Houshmandzadeh joins the show to tell Colin if Edelman should make the Hall of Fame. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
